features: A breathable, high-wicking jersey made predominantly from recycled fibers certified by GRS(Global Recycled Standard)one of the first jerseys in the world to feature recycled elastane
Three rear pockets give plenty of space to store ride essentials and a smaller zipped pocket is ideal for secure storage of a smartphone
A soft collar enhances comfort, while elastic at the bottom hem and sleeve grippers on the arms ensure the jerseys stays securely in place for the duration of a ride
A full-length zipper at the front, and mesh fabric in the armpits ensure plenty of ventilation
